descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a series of spells, \"Feather. I\" through \"Feather. V\", which temporarily fortify the caster\'s carry weight. This is intended to help mages overcome the fact that, since they almost never raise stamina when leveling up, their carry weight won\'t increase.

[b]Features:[/b]
[list]
[*]Spell books are sold by vendors, like any other Alteration spell
[*]Same naming convention as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730]Headbomb\'s Better Sorting[/url]
[*]Spell effects do not stack, in keeping with Skyrim\'s other buff spells
[*]Durations of all five spells are the same: five minutes, subject to perk and dual-cast bonuses
[/list]

[b]Compatibility:[/b]

This mod adds spells to vendors and loot. This is likely to conflict with any other mod that does so, including my own [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10438]Haste Spells[/url], in which case only one of the mods will actually succeed in adding its spells to the vendor/loot lists.

To fix this, you\'ll need to generate a Bashed Patch using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1840]Wrye Bash[/url]. This will merge the leveled lists together, solving the problem.

[b]Translations:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=864048]Sharanis Khan[/url] and [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr]La Confr√©rie des Traducteurs[/url] have made [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11765]a French translation of this mod[/url].
author: argvminusone

files.name: Feather Spells
files.changelogHtml: Fixed issue where all of the Feather spells would appear to be Novice level.
